  • Method Details

    • getRegistrationSystem

      public RegistrationSystem getRegistrationSystem()

    • register

      public String register​(Course course, String student_id) throws StudentCreditsOverflowException, MaxEnrollmentCourseException, StudentAlreadyEnrolled, SQLException
      this method registers a student to a course
      Parameters:
      course - course, student will be added
      student_id - unique identifier for student
      Returns:
      the unique identifier for course
      Throws:
      StudentCreditsOverflowException - Can't register to this course, because the limit of the student credits is exceeded(>30)
      MaxEnrollmentCourseException - Can't register to this course, because there are no more free places
      StudentAlreadyEnrolled - Can't register to this course, because student is already enrolled
      SQLException - Input or Output error when using a file

    • retrieveCoursesWithFreePlaces

      public List<Course> retrieveCoursesWithFreePlaces() throws SQLException
      this method retrieves a list with all courses that are not full
      Returns:
      List<Course>
      Throws:
      SQLException - Input or Output error when using a file

    • retrieveStudentsEnrolledForACourse

      public List<Student> retrieveStudentsEnrolledForACourse​(String id) throws SQLException
      this method retrieves a list with all students enrolled for a course
      Parameters:
      id - unique identifier for the course
      Returns:
      List<Student>
      Throws:
      SQLException - Input or Output error when using a file

    • getAllCourses

      public List<Course> getAllCourses() throws SQLException
      this method retrieves a list with all courses from courseRepo RegistrationSystem.courseJDBCRepo
      Returns:
      List<Course>
      Throws:
      SQLException - Input or Output error when using a file

    • addCourse

      public String addCourse​(String teacher_id, String name, String max_enrollment, String credits) throws SQLException
      this method creates a new course to RegistrationSystem.courseJDBCRepo
      Parameters:
      teacher_id - unique identifier for a teacher
      name - name of the course
      max_enrollment - max number of students that can enroll to the course
      credits - credits of the course
      Returns:
      String - unique identifier of the new course
      Throws:
      SQLException - Input or Output error when using a file

    • deleteCourse

      public void deleteCourse​(String course_id, String teacher_id) throws UnAuthorizedDeleteCourseException, SQLException
      this method deletes a course from RegistrationSystem.courseJDBCRepo
      Parameters:
      course_id - unique identifier of a course
      teacher_id - unique identifier of a teacher
      Throws:
      UnAuthorizedDeleteCourseException - Permission denied, because teacher did not create this course
      SQLException - Input or Output error when using a file

    • addPerson

      public UUID addPerson​(String fname, String lname, @NotNull @NotNull String option) throws SQLException
      this method adds a new Person to the Repo {@link RegistrationSystem#studentJDBCRepo,RegistrationSystem#teacherJDBCRepo}
      Parameters:
      fname - first name of the person
      lname - last name of the person
      option - SignUp as Teacher or Student
      Returns:
      UUID the unique identifier of the new person
      Throws:
      SQLException - Input or Output error when using a file

    • findPerson

      public String findPerson​(String id) throws SQLException
      this method checks if the unique Identifier of the user exists(when logging in)
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of a person
      Returns:
      String the name of the person and their status (Teacher or Student)
      Throws:
      SQLException - Input or Output error when using a file

    • changeCredits

      public void changeCredits​(String teacher_id, String course_id, String credits) throws StudentCreditsOverflowException, UnAuthorizedEditCourseException, SQLException
      this method changes umber of credits of a course
      Parameters:
      teacher_id - unique identifier for teacher
      course_id - unique identifier for course
      credits - the new number of credits
      Throws:
      StudentCreditsOverflowException - Can't change, because students enrolled to this course would exceed their limit
      UnAuthorizedEditCourseException - Can't change, because teacher did not create this course
      SQLException - Input or Output error when using a file
